whatIsService.title: What Is OBAGI Facial?
whatIsService.content:
The OBAGI Facial is a dermatologist-developed skin treatment that uses Obagi® professional-grade products to deliver visible and lasting results. Unlike salon facials that only work on the skin’s surface, this treatment penetrates deeper layers to improve:

Dullness and uneven tone
Fine lines and early ageing signs
Hyperpigmentation and melasma
Oily or acne-prone skin
Dehydration and loss of radiance

The Skin Firm offers customised OBAGI facials designed to target your unique skin needs, whether you’re seeking brightening, anti-ageing, or hydration.

faqs.title: FAQs on OBAGI Facial in Pune

questions.question: How is the OBAGI facial different from regular facials?
questions.answer: It uses dermatologist-grade actives that work deeper, offering real results unlike salon facials.

questions.question: Is the OBAGI facial safe for sensitive skin?
questions.answer: Yes protocols are customised for every skin type, including sensitive.

questions.question: How long does one session of OBAGI facial take?
When will I see results from my OBAGI facials treatment?
questions.answer: You’ll notice an immediate glow, with improved tone and texture after 2–3 sessions.

questions.question: How many sessions are recommended?
questions.answer: Usually a series of 4-6 facials, spaced 3-4 weeks apart, for best results.

questions.question: Does the OBAGI facial help with pigmentation?
questions.answer: Yes OBAGI brightening products are especially effective for pigmentation and melasma.

questions.question: Can men also get OBAGI facials?
questions.answer: Absolutely many of our male clients choose OBAGI for clear, healthy skin.

questions.question: Is there downtime after my OBAGI treatment?
questions.answer: Minimal to none only slight redness may occur, which settles in a few hours.

questions.question: Can I combine OBAGI facials with other treatments?
questions.answer: Yes they pair well with chemical peels, laser toning, or anti-ageing procedures.

questions.question: How long do results last?
questions.answer: Results last 4-6 weeks, especially when supported with OBAGI homecare.
